Class FontLoader

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.fridlund.javalabra.game.utils.FontLoader

  • public class FontLoader
extends java.lang.Object
    A static class, containing all the Fonts that the game could like to use.

      • loadFont

        public static void loadFont(java.lang.String key,
            java.lang.String fontName,
            FontLoader.FontStyle style,
            int size)
        Creates a new font. If you use an already used key, then it will update the old one.
        Parameters:
        key - - access the font with this
        fontName - - defines what system font to load.
        style - - italic, bold or plain.
        size - - pixel size
